attributes.action: TREES are US stop children  climbing in them~!
attributes.additional_details:
We need to protect TREES there are so important to the environment. Every time they are climbed the bird and insect life is disturbed; it  is an ecco system that we need to nourish and respect.
Children need to be taught this in school so they understand why they should not damage them breaking branches. Grow conkers instead of just smashing them , plant trees watch them grow take pride in their own surroundings.
They can learn to climb on climbing walls and be properly supervised.
